tool_description: In Api you can get weather details using zip code, city name, city code, country code and geographical location values
title: weather_details

api_list.name: Request data using zip code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather_details.p.rapidapi.com/{zip_code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather_details.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Request data using state name, city code and country code
api_list.description: Requesting data using state name, city code, and country code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather_details.p.rapidapi.com/{city_name}/{state_code}/{country_code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather_details.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get details using Geographic location
api_list.description: Get details using latitude and longitudes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather_details.p.rapidapi.com/{latitude}/{longitude}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather_details.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
